resource_requirements.NEXP: Number of Experiments - Optional - Defaults to 1
resource_requirements.DATESTAMP: Current Date and Time Stamp - Optional - Defaults to (date +'%y%m%d%H%M%S%N')
resource_requirements.CLEAR_CACHES: Whether to clear caches - Optional - Defaults to 1
resource_requirements.API_LOG_DIR: API Log Directory - Optional - Defaults to ./api_logs
resource_requirements.TIME_TAGS: Enable Time Tagging - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.NVTX_FLAG: Enable NVTX Profiling - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.NCCL_TEST: Enable NCCL Test - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.SYNTH_DATA: Enable Synthetic Data - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.EPOCH_PROF: Enable Epoch Profiling - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.DISABLE_CG: Disable CUDA Graphs - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.API_LOGGING: Enable API Logging - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.REMOUNT_WORKDIR: Remount Working Directory - Optional - Defaults to 0
resource_requirements.MELLANOX_VISIBLE_DEVICES: Optional - Environment variable for Mellanox device visibility
resource_requirements.DGXNGPU: Number of GPUs per DGX Node - Required
